title: The Myles Garrett–Mason Rudolph Incident | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Browns defensive end Myles Garrett was ejected from Thursday's game against the Steelers for swinging a helmet at Pittsburgh quarterback Mason Rudolph. The NFL has suspended Garrett indefinitely, with a minimum of at least this regular season and playoffs. We provide initial reactions, context, and analysis from the incident.
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
